expo.name: PeerLearningHub
expo.description: Connect, learn, and grow together with peers in an innovative learning platform

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow users to share photos in learning communities.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to allow you to share images in learning discussions.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone for peer learning sessions and voice communications.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow PeerLearningHub to access your camera to share photos in learning communities.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow PeerLearningHub to access your photos to share images in learning discussions.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow PeerLearningHub to save photos from learning sessions.
